Hello Internets.

My name is J.Shamsul Bahri. I am a full stack web engineer. I make websites for fun and profit. Around the web I often go by the handle @jibone.

twitter.com/jibone Twitter

I am the founder of Jiboneus.com a webzine about music, films and arts. I am also the co-founder of WirawanWeb.com webzine on all web related. Both of these websites I am currently in the process of revemping.

I am currently a web developer working in a small digital agency Ezypzy.
